queries.sql: SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'aerialway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'aeroway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'amenity'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'attraction'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'barrier'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'building'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations WHERE tags ? 'building'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_highway_z$zoom
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'highway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_landuse_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'landuse' IN ('farmland', 'forest', 'meadow')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_landuse_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'landuse' IN ('farmland', 'forest', 'meadow', 'residential', 'vineyard')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'landuse'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations WHERE tags ? 'landuse'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'leisure'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations WHERE tags ? 'leisure'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'man_made'

SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_natural_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'natural' IN ('wood', 'scrub', 'heath', 'grassland', 'bare_rock', 'scree', 'shingle', 'sand', 'mud', 'water', 'wetland', 'glacier', 'beach')

SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_natural_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'natural' IN ('wood', 'scrub', 'heath', 'grassland', 'bare_rock', 'scree', 'shingle', 'sand', 'mud', 'water', 'wetland', 'glacier', 'beach')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'natural' AND tags ->> 'natural' NOT IN ('coastline')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations WHERE tags ? 'natural' AND tags ->> 'natural' NOT IN ('coastline')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_point_z$zoom WHERE tags != '{}'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ->> 'power' IN ('cable', 'line', 'minor_line', 'plant', 'substation')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_railway_z$zoom
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'railway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_route_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'route'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'route'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_waterway_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'waterway' IN ('river')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_waterway_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'waterway' IN ('river', 'stream')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'waterway'
